select_button: Select one of the buttons below: 📲
name: Name
title: Title
ask_field: 🛑 — Reply to this message with the requirement: - {field}. Send within {timeout}s.
max_aliases:
You have reached the maximum number of aliases you can add. ⛔

Remove some to add another.
field_updated: The field {field} has been successfully updated.
guess_cheated:
🤨 — It seems you tried to cheat, but I caught you! (❌)

Because of you, the character <details>{name}</details> has escaped.
alias_too_long: The alias is too long, it must contain at most {max} characters. ⛔
confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the {object} {id}?
error_occurred: An error occurred while trying to update the field {field}.
alias_too_short: The alias is too short, it must contain at least {min} characters. ⛔
operation_cancelled: ⚠️ — {reason}! Use the command again and reply in time.
alias_already_exists: ⚠️ — There is already an alias with this name. Try another.
not_a_group: This command can only be used in groups.
not_a_id: 🤔 — That's not an ID. Try again.
invalid_id: 🤔 — The ID you entered is invalid. Try again.
invalid_command: 🤨 — Command used in the wrong way. Try: {cmd}
start:
Hi! I'm a bot that can help you
collect
waifus or husbandos from various animes. To get started, type /help
help: There is a list of commands you can use: /start - Start the bot /help - Get a list of commands /language - Change the language used to display messages /list - List all the waifus/husbandos you have collected /delete - Delete a waifu/husbando
language_set: The language has been set to {new_lang}
select_language: Select the language you want to use to display messages:
new_character: 🎰 A mysterious character appears...! 🔥 — Reply to this message with the character's name to collect it.
no_characters: Oops! You haven't collected any characters yet in this group. Go get one to use this feature. 🔙
has_character: 🤚 You already have this character in this group.
max_characters: You have reached the maximum number of characters you can collect. ⛔ Would you like to exchange any for this one? ♻ You have {timeout}s to decide.
not_a_character: This is not a valid character. ⁉️
wrong_character: ⚠️ — Oops! The character's name isn't this, try again.
select_character: Select the character you want to swap with: You have {timeout}s to choose.
character_escaped:
Oops... the character <details>{name}</details> has escaped! (❌)

🔖 Remember them and be faster next time!
expired_character: This character has expired or has already been captured. (❌)
unknown_character: 🤔 — I couldn't find that character. Try again.
character_collected: 🏆 — Congratulations! You got it right and captured... {name} 🔥
unknown_series: 🤔 — I couldn't find that series. Try again.
